g.text: Add images from computer with or without material ID in file-name
Manually add Datawell identifiers to images
[IF file-name IS a valid Datawell identifier]
Request Datawell Object for material ID.
[ELSE material ID does NOT exist in Datawell]
[ELSE file-name is NOT a valid Datawell identifier.]
Display list of image with OR without Datawell object
Display list of images and metadata.
Remove image/Datawell object OR just Datawell object
Upload image(s) to DDB Cover service
Upload list of images and Datawell
